interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: NuJu Revitalizing Eye Gel For Dark Circles Under Eyes, Puffiness, Crows Feet and Wrinkles 15g Contains C4-Peptide-3
Review Date: 2015/12/27
Store: NuJu Skincare
Product Description: ["Say goodbye to tired eyes and unveil a luminous and rested look with this potent eye gel. Give your eyes a brightening boost with this collagen-boosting, instant-brightening eye gel. Formulated with time-released retinol to increase cellular renewal rate and micronized ruby crystals to instantly illuminate and restore eyes youthful glow. This non-greasy, quickly-absorbed formula is infused with green tea, chamomile and cucumber extracts to moisturize and soothe the delicate eye area. helps prevent dark circles under eyes, puffiness, crows feet and wrinkles. This eye gel treatment addresses every eye concern. Contains C4-peptide-3, a chemical complex for the treatment of puffy eyes, dark circles. The most effective eye gel available. Noticeable results reported within two weeks. After 2 weeks of application. 86% reported that their skin looks more even/uniform. 72% reported that the appearance of lines, wrinkles and crows feet diminished. 92% reported a brighter looking eye area. 100% reported rehydrated skin. 100% reported perfect tolerance (no redness and no irritation). 100% reported that their eye area looks more rested and refreshed. Clinical test conducted on women ages 25-45. The difference v/s others: BHS bio-herbal compound+ C4-peptide-3 chemical complex + NuJu rejuva complex + (dark circle, puffy eyes correction + rejuvination). NuJu's eye gel helps restore and replenish moisture while reducing puffiness and fading dark circles. The formula diminishes the appearance of lines and wrinkles as it recharges tired eyes and creates a more rested look."]
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'NUJUEYE', 'UPC': '616919999580', 'Manufacturer': 'Eureka Brands LLC'}
Review Text: This is a great product from a great seller. I'm overly impressed with this product.  I enjoyed testing out this product. This is a product that I'd gladly purchase again. I am a satisfied happy customer. I was given the opportunity to purchase this product at a discounted price in exchange for my unbiased review.
Review Title: This is a great product from a great seller
Rating: 5.0

Miracalis
['* Face Moisturizer * Face Anti Aging * Deep Hydration Face Cream * Hydrating Anti Aging Moisturizer * Aging Cream * Hydration Cream For Face * Regenerating Day Cream * Face Moisturizing Cream * Facial Moisturizers Anti Aging * Anti Aging Facial Cream * Hydrating Moisturizer for Face * Deep Moisturizing Face Cream * Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Moisturizing Cream Anti Aging * Peptide Face Cream * Moisturizer Facial Cream * Deep Face Moisturizer * Hydrating Facial Moisturizer * Best Face Moisturizer Anti Aging * Anti Aging Skin Care * Bare Mineral * Neck Moisturizer * Neck Cream * Skin Cream * Anti Aging Skin', 'Your Face Will Look Lovelier In Only 15 Days!', 'Reduces the depth of your facial wrinkles with daily use.', 'You will quickly look noticeably younger, healthier, and more attractive.', 'Simply apply Miracalis Anti-Aging Moisturizer Cream right after washing your face in the morning and again at night.', 'What About My Skin Type?', 'A safe, gentle, hypoallergenic formula that is tested and recommended for all 4 major skin types: Normal, Sensitive, Dry or Oily Skin', 'Your Shield Against The Signs Of Aging', "Your skin is under daily attack - air pollution, the sun's harmful rays, germs and time itself all wear down your skin's natural barriers. The result is dry, cracked and tired looking skin.", 'Our formula restores the two natural antioxidants (Vitamin E and Co-Enzyme Q10) that your skin needs to properly repair and maintain this barrier.', 'Your skin will look younger, be less sensitive. You will have healthier, attractive and glowing skin again.', '100% Satisfaction Guaranteed, Made in the USA']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Category Preference**: The user maintains a strong interest in skincare, particularly anti-aging products and moisturizers for enhanced hydration. Recent engagement with eye treatments demonstrates an expanding interest in solutions addressing specific concerns, particularly around the eye area. The user continues to explore wellness accessories prioritizing comfort and skin safety.

- **Key Features Valued**: The user values formulations that diminish wrinkles, improve skin texture, and deliver deep hydration. Their latest positive experience with an eye gel highlights an appreciation for immediate results in skin appearance and an effective, gentle application across different product types, with a preference for science-backed solutions.

- **Cruelty-Free & Hypoallergenic**: The user remains committed to ethical skincare, focusing on cruelty-free and hypoallergenic products suitable for sensitive skin.

- **Consistent Rebuying Behavior**: The user shows a pattern of satisfaction with their purchases, demonstrating a willingness to repurchase and recommend products that yield effective results, as evidenced by their positive review.

- **Performance Expectations**: Quick, notable improvements in the appearance of skin, particularly around the eye area, are essential, aligning with their focus on a youthful look.

- **Overall Sentiment**: The user maintains a positive sentiment towards their skincare experiences, exhibiting high satisfaction with new products that align with their values of efficacy and ethical standards, reflecting an enthusiastic approach to integrating innovative skincare solutions. 

Overall, the user's preferences center on effective, ethical, and gentle solutions that promote hydration, quick results, and broader comfort in their grooming and wellness routine.
